items.name: Vegan Mezze Romana
items.description: Smoked chilli chargrilled aubergine, sundried tomato harissa, jalapeno and Roquito peppers, finished with rocket and creamy humous on a Romana base. Also available on a gluten-free base.

items.name: Margherita Bufala
items.description: Buffalo mozzarella, tomato, fresh basil, fresh tomato, garlic oil and oregano, finished with fresh basil and extra virgin olive oil on a Romana base. Also available on a gluten-free base.

items.name: Barbacoa
items.description: Pulled Barbacoa beef, spiced chipotle salsa, tomato, mozzarella and garlic oil topped with fresh red onion, tomato and coriander on a Romana base.

items.name: American Hot
items.description: Pepperoni, mozzarella and tomato, with your choice of hot green, Roquito or jalapeño peppers on a Romana base.

items.name: Diavolo
items.description: Hot spiced beef, pepperoni, mozzarella, tomato, green pepper, red onion and Tabasco, with your choice of hot green, Roquito or jalapeño peppers on a Romana base.

items.name: Padana
items.description: Goat’s cheese, mozzarella, caramelised onion, spinach, red onion, tomato and garlic oil on a Romana base (pictured). Vegan option available.

items.name: Pollo ad Astra
items.description: Chicken, sweet red peppers, red onion, mozzarella, tomato, Cajun spices and garlic oil on a Romana base.

items.name: Pollo Forza
items.description: Hot chilli chicken, Roquito peppers, roasted peppers, garlic oil, tomato, mozzarella, parsley, chilli oil and Gran Milano cheese on a Romana base.

items.name: Marinated Green Olives
items.description: Pink peppercorns and garlic.

items.name: Slow-Roasted Tomatoes
items.description: Oregano and garlic.

items.name: Garlic King Prawns
items.description: With garlic butter, tomatoes, roasted peppers and chilli flakes with fresh tomatoes, red onion, parsley and Dough Balls. Our Dough Balls are also available gluten-free.

items.name: Dough Balls 'PizzaExpress'
items.description: A PizzaExpress classic, with garlic butter. Gluten-free Dough Balls available.

items.name: Gluten-free Dough Balls 'PizzaExpress'
items.description: A PizzaExpress classic, with garlic butter. Gluten-free.

items.name: Vegan Dough Balls 'PizzaExpress'
items.description: A PizzaExpress classic, served with your choice of houmous or smoky tomato harissa.

items.name: White Chocolate & Raspberry Cheesecake
items.description: With fruit coulis. Served with your choice of cream, gelato or mascarpone.

items.name: Tiramisu
items.description: Ladyfingers, mascarpone, marsala wine, coffee and cocoa.

items.name: Honeycomb Cream Slice
items.description: Honeycomb, chocolate, whipped cream and salted caramel on a biscuit base with chocolate sauce. Served with your choice of cream, gelato or mascarpone.

items.name: Vanilla Cheesecake
items.description: With fruit coulis. Served with your choice of cream, gelato or mascarpone.

items.name: Raspberry Sorbet
items.description: 2 scoops - Raspberry (pictured) or Coconut.

items.name: Cornish Orchards Blush Cider
items.description: Cornish Orchards Blush Cider (ABV 4%).

items.name: Cornish Orchards Gold Cider
items.description: Cornish Orchards Gold Cider (ABV 4%).

items.name: Meantime Anytime IPA
items.description: Anytime IPA (ABV 4.7%).
